name: Dark Force: Special Edition
overview: Released in Commodore Free #078. It is the year 2173, and the Cygons are threatening to activate a huge laser satellite, which if activated, can destroy all of the planets in the solar system. War has broken out loose from all planets beyond. No such pilot survived the attack, except for the Cygons. You are a proud pilot of the Dark Force, the fittest hunk of junk in the entire galaxy. Your mission is to fly through 3 sectors, and destroy all 20 generators which control the power of the laser. The Cygons and their Allies will be out to stop you no matter how tough or weak you really are. Every 6 generators destroyed will award you an extra life.
